rev.model.core
Class BaseModelDelegate

java.lang.Object
  apse.core.APSEModelDelegate
      rev.model.core.BaseModelDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelDelegate
public class BaseModelDelegate
extends apse.core.APSEModelDelegate
implements ModelDelegate

The customized model delegate that provides non-APSE model access to apse actor-implemented model items.

Author:
maxwelldickey
